ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Detail level - Low ...?
ygData.msgSnippet: they have mentioned they were going to fix this, but never have.  low, med, high look the same to me.  they need to let you see epic weapons no matter what
ygData.messageBody:
they have mentioned they were going to fix this, but never have. low, med,
high look the same to me. they need to let you see epic weapons no matter
what your density, or have a separate setting for them, and they need to
make the settings actually mean something, since they all look the same. i
don't see how a bard can play with particles on, which is unfortunate. i
would love to play in a low setting if it really meant low.

Shada

> I personally love the particle effects and I never play with
> out them. I
> always kept the density set to low ...but the sparkles look
> the same to me
> on low, med and high. Is it just me? I hit 39 last night
> and the particle
> effects are killing me. I don't want to turn them off but I
> am not seeing
> a choice here. Any suggestions? I play in the "out of body"
> views already.
>
> -Steve
